author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY IN EFFECT FOR THE TAMPA BAY AREA AS  MILTON CONTINUES MOVING INLAND... ...1000 PM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary:
...FLASH FLOOD EMERGENCY IN EFFECT FOR THE TAMPA BAY AREA AS  MILTON CONTINUES MOVING INLAND... ...1000 PM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
 As of 10:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 9
 the center of Milton was located near 27.5, -82.3
 with movement ENE at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 958 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 110 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Milton (AT4/AL142024)
